name: Ava the RecSys Scientist
summary: Data scientist with 6 years building recommender systems and ranking pipelines. Loves causal inference and bandits.
transcript: Hi I'm Ava, I live for experimentation and fast iteration on recsys models.

name: Leo the LLM Engineer
summary: ML engineer focused on LLM tooling, prompt engineering, and retrieval augmented generation for enterprise search.
transcript: I prototype with small models, deploy on Kubernetes, and track evals.

name: Maya the PM
summary: Product manager shipping AI features for collaboration tools. Background in UX research and growth.
transcript: I like pairing closely with design and engineering to ship measurable impact.

name: Noah the Voice Researcher
summary: Researcher exploring speech understanding, diarization, and voice cloning safety.
transcript: I spend weekends hacking on audio datasets and safe voice cloning.

name: Sofia the XR Builder
summary: XR engineer using Unity and Three.js to craft multiplayer social spaces with WebRTC.
transcript: Latency and presence are everything. I ship bold 3D experiences.
